description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- November 12th, 2024

description: In our How to Paint Everything series we look at how to paint well, everything, with different techniques and approaches. This week Rich is back to paint a Mahut, a colossal elephant statue brought to life by the Sorcerer Kings, the latest faction for Conquest: The Last Argument of Kings by Para Bellum Games. Thanks […]
title: How To Paint Everything: Conquest – Sorcerer Kings Mahut

description: We have games covering every conceivable topic, from fashion design to strolling through a national park. And now there’s a board game about making it big in the 1970s music scene.
title: Rock Hard: 1977 — The Goonhammer Review

description: We take a look at some of the challenges playing 500- and 1,000-point games, and propose some army construction rules for making them a bit more balanced.
title: The Narrative Forge: Improving Games of Warhammer 40,000 at 500 and 1,000 points

description: Stephanie, Jessicakes, and Urr banter and bicker about the Magical Artefacts in Kings of War!
title: It’s All A Kind Of Magic: Kings of War Magical Artefacts in Clash of Kings 2025

description: We take a deep dive into the Ironstorm Spearhead Detachment from Codex: Space Marines, and look at a successful list for the detachment.
title: Detachment Focus: Ironstorm Spearhead (Updated November 12, 2024)

description: Hey everybody, for today’s How to Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol we are going to be working on Warlock. Admittedly, for a character that is nearly as old as I am, I have no recollection of him. The most I know of him is that Warlock is a living machine of the race known as […]
title: How to Paint Everything: Crisis Protocol – Warlock
